text: Beautiful , comfortable and friendly hotel near the beach . Great value for the money . Good situation , next to a big mall and the beach . Rooms really comfortable , clean and no noisy . Wifi excellent .
Room veeeeery big , comfortable big bed , hot shower , lush garden , pool and breakfast for 130k IDR in high season : what U want more ? Ok , no towel or sheet but . .

room without power plug point , hair dryer , water boiler , safe box and even tissue . They don ' t have any queen size bed as well . people were friend but all yr request then will not care . its very small and the wifi is totally suck here .

The accomodation was great given the price 30 $ per night i got from booking . com . the hotel was clean and two swiming pools to cool off the bali heat . The location - seminyak is great , great for a chilled out people . Very close Peti ( something ) and seminyak beach a taxi will offset you less than 3 $ .

For the price this hotel excellent . Rooms are large and comfortable . Pool area was a bit rundown but functional . Location suited me but a lot of building work going on in streets nearby . Overall this hotel exceeded my expectations for the money I paid .

We stayed at the Maharani with another five friends and had the best time . Staff great friendly and entertaining . Rooms light , airy and clean . They accommodated us by putting all our rooms together side by side . Great location on poppies lane 1 and beach across the road , short walk to markets and shopping . Would recommend a stay here as when we return will be staying again .

This is good hotel for you stay for a while in Singaraja if you find good and cheap hotel . The view is good near of the beach and it has 1 swimming pool . The bedroom is clean and service is good . But the parking is not large enough .

Great friendly staff awesome manager and security ! Very small pool - a glass door and window separates u from mac Donald ' s ! But u can order mc Donald ' s while sitting in the pool ! Awsome cocktails ! Breaky is not amazing but simple ! I have stayed at the Ramayana hotel kuta and I prefer that !

We paid $ 40 for the deluxe room . There wasn ' t anything wrong with the room really but the photos the website shows were probably taken 15 years ago . The room is old and so is the bathroom . The king bed was just two singles pushed together . There was hot water and the place was clean though , breakfast was included and was tasty .

Pro : nice staff , good breakfast , pool quiet , room was nice but had few small issues ( below ) , location was the absolute best . Cons : shower drains were clogged and shower temperature either boiling or freezing . Overall I enjoyed my stay . Would definitely recommend .

no one helped us with out luggages . we stayed here 2nights . it was really one midnight and we have to call the reception but the reply was terrible to understand that they just checked in . we never had a good sleep during our stay . it was a clean with a fast wifi and a good breakfast service though . .

A small hotel with a decent bed and adequate facilities . Breakfast was mediocre and the menu was the same everyday . Some changes in variety would be an improvement . Staff was friendly . There is a church nearby the hotel about 5 mins walk and a small shopping mall opposite the church . The beach is rather far and a 10 min walk . Overall an average place to stay .

we book one room with extra bed . the room was spacious and comfortable . the hotel have a pool not too big but nice . the breakfast excellent . they have rent car also rent motorcycle . near to legian street , kuta beach also another place . will recommend this place to everyone who need the hotel budget with nice facilities .
No Daily Compliment water , No small refrigerator , no buffet drink and fruit for breakfast . But still clean and quite . Need to change the bed , but still oke . Overall you get what you pay .

stay for 3 nights in standard room . 2 min walk to lippo mall and 10 min walk to discovery mall . 10 min walk to kuta beach . very strategy location . lodge a report on hot condition of aircon and immediate action taken . breakfast nt much variety but tasty .

Good concept with unique design We got compliment " welcome popcorn " at restaurant . . Oxtail soup is the best menu & very recommended . . Room clean , all staff are friendly and helpful . . they have morning dance . . Love it Will definetly back . . Thank you fame hotel .

Plus : Hotel staff are very nice , professional and very helpful . Minus : The hotel does not fulfill 5 star requirements . Quite expensive but poor maintenance of hotel amenities and facility . The hotel including breakfasts is opted for Chinese tour bus groups . Hope for the best , prepare for the worst . Cannot recommend this hotel .

Nice and quiet hotel . Not far from discovery or lipo mall . Close to the main kuta strip , close to the airport but without the noise from the planes . Staff are exceptionally helpful , friendly and welcoming . Room service excellent and room clean and tidy . Air - conditioning nice and cold and very big beds . Very good value !

A great boutique hotel that has amazing staff and service . Very relaxing here , you arrive and instantly decompress , its as if the entire resort is a spa ! The pool downstairs looks almost too beautiful to swim in , very fountain like .

We stay here because we have plan to do trekking at Mount Batur . nice hotel located in a mountain cliff shelf that has beautiful scenery . We stayed at this hotel for 2 days with my husband . we would recommend this hotel to travelers who will come to Bali .

The pool is ok , gym oke . The property looks better in pictures . The rooms are ok but needs maintenance . Not much options in breakfast . poor service etiquette and communication skills by the staff , overall not good .

Last night I stayed on this hotel , their receptionis quite good , only 3minutes for check - in registration . But this hotel are full with mosquito , I must ask for mosquito repellent to their front desk . Guests must bring own toothbrush and tooth paste , because they not provide these item .
This hotel is in a great location and such good value for money as it is a budget hotel but it is really nice inside and the rooms were great , good aircon , comfy beds , no issues at all .

its recommend hotel for buleleng area , close to mall and restaurant , but no pool under 6 years . morning bites need variation , friendly staff , non smoking room its very good choice for family , the price is worth it .

A nice and comfortable Hotel . Nice and helpful staf . Don ' t eat the food in the resturant though , not even the breakefast ! Very disapointing ! But there are a few good places down the road and everything else Is really good .

We were booked into the Aston by our travel agent . During our stay in Bali we needed to book another at a different part of our trip and decided to stay at the Aston again . We would highly reccomend it to anyone wanting to stay somewhere near the airport .

Wanna plan for Meeting , I will fully recommmend to stay and book your valuable meeting with Fame Sunset . Amazing food , Amazing meeting room with motivational quotes , clear LCD Projector , Boombastic Sound System . . . Satisfaction guaranteed ! ! ! !

We only stayed one night as in transit to Lembongan . It ' s a cheap place to stay . Room was clean , bed was comfy , breakfast was average . Pool area could do with some maintenance , decking in some areas lifting around pool . Pool was refreshing . Good location , close to main area of Kuta . Suited our family for a nights stay .

My family and I were looking forward to living at this lovely hotel with the amenities and services provided . Yes , it was a perfect short stay given by this team . It also includes a location close to an exciting area in Bali . Well done .

I stayed 3 nights at this hotel , situated right next to the airport . Location is just prefect , walk able distance to the beach , restaurants , spa ' s . best value for money . Totally worth it . i will recommend this hotel to all .

Hotel is just steps away from Kuta Beach . Big room but Breakfast need improvement and don ' t stay in room 407 as they will " Parked " that cleaning cart just beside your door . : ( Note : Free WiFi is only available in lobby . Stayed 11 to 14 Feb 2020 .
Hotel was far from main road . Room were spacy , its suitable for lil family . Breakfast were good with so many option either western or asian .

Upgrade cleanliness for the room please . Overall a good stay in the hotel . Very close to the airport and nice facilities . For the staff , please do not smoke when you are in service with the guest . Keep it up !
The room ok . got extra bolster . Breakfast not really good choise . The swimming pool ok . Easy to double six beach only 15 min walk or 2 min by taxi .
lack options of food , BBQ even not as expected . seem like they limits their food , should asking them every time want to take meal . server also not so welcome .
We found the hotel to be great but the surf waas very very crowded all day and the water not so clean .

When we arrived there was no hassle . we got our hotel cards and straight up to our rooms , which were lovely and tidy . Great for what we paid . The hotel is close to shopping destinations and right across the road fro the beach . Staff are amazing and make you feel like family . they do a lot to please you .

I got this hotel as a package from my Bali ticket purchase from Groupon . It was a really good deal , cheap and with breakfast included . This hotel has a really nice lobby and service staff but the room they gave me was facing just a concrete wall with no scenery at all . The room feels damp / wet and was infested with mosquitoes . Never going back there again .

Booked on a Agoda , photo ' s looked good . The whole hotel is old and dirty see my picture ' s attached . Rang agoda to get refund the Ozz Hotel manager refused . I waisted time and money on a holiday booking . It shouldnt be AVAILABLE on booking sites without upto date images .

Booked on a Agoda , photo ' s looked good . The whole hotel is old and dirty see my picture ' s attached . Rang agoda to get refund the Ozz Hotel manager refused . I waisted time and money on a holiday booking . It shouldnt be AVAILABLE on booking sites without upto date images .

Going back for Our 4th time I January and this time we are taking our family . Rooms are a little dated but clean . The grounds and gardens are beautiful and well maintained and the pool is ALWAYS crystal clear .

The hotel is cheap & Clean , just the location is quite far from the main happening areas at Kuta , Bali ! Breakfast is not proper prepare and the price is high , better to book the room that include breakfast !

labels.opinion: far from the main happening areas

text: Hotel was simple but nice . Good pool to cool down in and breakfast ok . Towels provided , could do with getting new towels as ours were thread bare and had holes in . Short distance to other restaurants and if you want to go a bit further very easy to get a taxi . In walking distance to the beach .

I spent 4 nights here and I absolutely loved the atmosphere . I had all the space I needed and the food was quite good too . It ' s located close to the airport and convenient if you are flying the day after or so . However , most of the top Bali attractions are located far from here which cost me more than I was anticipating to get there .

We stayed for 5 nights at ibis , bali legian . the location is very good . Right in the centre of the town . Rooms are neat and clean . Service is also good . overall good value for money . Also the breakfast was good .
It was a nice and friendly place to stay food was not flash but ok there English could have been better as it was hard to understand at times . there pool area was very basic .

We visit this hotel recomended by kilroy in mid november . Very nice staff and good hotel regarding the cost . The pool area is almost empty so we had it for our selves : ) . We had a plesent stay . Extra much thanks to the girl in the reception who let us use her motorbike to the pharmacy when my girlfriend got sick .

I was impressed with my stay at Dekuta ! The location was great and the hotel itself was nice and clean and had a great pool . I felt it was good value for money and staff were always friendly and helpful .

The staff were helpful and friendly . The rooms were neat but not particularly clean . The pool was lovely . I did spot a cockroach in the bathroom but for what it costs to stay here ( cheaaaap ) it didn ' t bother me .

Ordinary budget hotels in Bali are usually not really hygienic . But this particular budget hotel is surprisingly the utmost opposite . Especially the toilet area . . ! ! kuddos to everyday . Staffs were smiling all the time but it seems that they were having a difficult time speaking English to me . Overall . . . love it and I really am looking forward in staying again . .
